channel.title: Chrome - Today I Learnt...
channel.description: Recent content in Chrome on Today I Learnt...

item.title: You can take screenshots with Chrome DevTools
item.description: Chrome DevTools can take screenshots via its Command Menu (which can be opened with cmd + shift + p).

item.title: There's a Chrome extension for switching AWS IAM roles
item.description: It’s the AWS Extend Switch Roles extension. AWS’s Console only keeps your 5 most recent AWS accounts as quick links, which this extension gives doesn’t limit you.
